document.full_text: longtime new york yankees trainer gene monahan, who tended generations of players from bobby murcer to derek jeter, said on wednesday he was retiring at the end of the season after nearly 50 years with the club.
document.title: longtime yankees trainer to retire at season's end
lines_and_colors: longtime new york yankees trainer gene monahan, who tended generations of players from bobby murcer to derek jeter, said on wednesday he was retiring at the end of the season after nearly 50 years with the club.
